snippet: The rapturous feeling may not last for their long-suffering fans, but the team ended Monday 4-0, leading their division. Best of all, the hated Yankees have struggled.
abstract: New York Mets fans are elated, as the team remains undefeated after four games and is leading its division; some are already dreaming of the playoffs; victories are especially sweet as they watch the Yankees struggle.
lead_paragraph: The rapturous feeling may not last for their long-suffering fans, but the team ended Monday 4-0, leading their division. Best of all, the hated Yankees have struggled.

headline.seo: Mets Fans Briefly Revel in an Undefeated Season
headline.main: Mets Fans Revel, for Now, in an Undefeated Season
headline.print_headline: However Fleeting, the Rapture Of the Mets’ Undefeated Season
